entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 6:28 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:28 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
